message: Chihiro: "!"
Yusaku: "You were having quite the nightmare."
Chihiro: "Ah... Ah..."
Yusaku: "Who is this 'Uncle' you mentioned?"
The devil's words go in one ear and out the other.
I'm desperately trying to grasp the situation.
Sho is still slumped in front of me.
He's snoring as usual.
But why is he in front of me?
I'm sure I couldn't stand up...
I was supposed to be squatting next to him.
Chihiro: "Ah...!"
My consciousness is gradually becoming clearer.
Along with that, my strangeness becomes more prominent.
Firstly, I can hardly move my body.
My arms are behind my back.
My legs, slightly apart, are fixed by something.
Chihiro: "(A, chair?)"
Right, a chair.
The legs of the chair I always use.
In addition, my appearance.
My hips are thrust out, bent at a right angle from my waist.
And I'm even wearing strange clothes I've never seen before.
The fluttering of the skirt visible from the shoulder.
It's like a costume a prima donna would wear.
Chihiro: "W, what is this...?"
Yusaku: "It's a wedding dress."
Chihiro: "A, a wedding dress?"
Yusaku: "It's quite luxurious for a rental, isn't it?"
Chihiro: "W, where did you get something like this..."
Yusaku: "I had it in the trunk of my car for a while. Of course, it wasn't a coincidence, but rather, completely planned."
Chihiro: "W, why would I have to wear that..."
Yusaku: "It's natural, because you're the bride."
Chihiro: "B, bride?"
Yusaku: "Tonight is our wedding ceremony. Of course, it's between me and you."
Chihiro: "!"
My heart felt like it was about to stop.
This is no joke, it really did.
Chihiro: "Please stop joking around!"
Yusaku: "Ordinary clothes wouldn't create the right atmosphere for a wedding night. Although, instead of a tuxedo, I'll be using my penis to show my groom-like charm."
Chihiro: "Ah...!"
A scream that didn't turn into a voice.
The demon appeared from a blind spot.
Wearing only a bow tie around his neck, completely naked.
His penis was erect like a club in that appearance.
And it was so hard that it refused to sway.
Chihiro: "Ah...!"
I was horrified.
It didn't look like a human penis no matter how you looked at it.
Perhaps it was because I had looked directly at that symbol.
An unbearable fear pierced through my body.
My body started to tremble so much that the legs of the chair made noise.
What is a wedding ceremony?
What does wedding night mean?
Does it mean something will happen in front of Sho?
That's impossible.
There's no way he'd take such a risk.
Just like before.
He's just trying to scare me.
It's obvious.
Chihiro: "I, I understand, so please untie me."
Yusaku: "Understand? What do you understand?"
Chihiro: "Ah..."
How should I explain it?
I'm in a situation where I can't move.
I was scared to stimulate him in the wrong way.
Yusaku: "What exactly do you understand?"
Chihiro: "Th, that is..."
Kyaa!!
Yusaku: "You're about to understand, aren't you?"
Chihiro: "P, put my underwear back on..."
Yusaku: "Where's the need to put it back?"
Chihiro: "M, my husband is right in front of us."
Yusaku: "That's exactly why I did this."
Chihiro: "Wh, what do you mean by that?"
Yusaku: "It's a special occasion, our wedding. Someone should witness it."
*Flap.*
Chihiro: "Hi...!"
No.
He stroked my butt.
Yusaku: "That's why I thought I'd have your husband wake up to your lewd moans."
Chihiro: "If you do that, you too will... Ah!!"
*Squish, squelch...*
A finger suddenly slipped inside.
I was startled.
Partly because of the unexpected sensation of penetration.
And partly because he had touched me so deeply inside.
Even if the surface was toyed with, the inside wasn't.
At most, only the tip of his tongue had entered.
But this time it's different.
As if confirming the level of wetness, the demon kneaded me squelchily.
He seemed to have a clear objective as he tried to loosen my narrowed entrance.
Chihiro: "W, wait... ah... haa..."
Yusaku: "...Don't move your ass."
Chihiro: "No...!"
Who could stay still?
This is different from having my legs spread under the table.
Everything ends the moment Sho wakes up.
What this man is doing can be considered madness.
Chihiro: "A, are you out of your mind?"
Yusaku: "Don't hold back, let out a louder voice."
Chihiro: "N, no..."
Yusaku: "Hmm..."
Chihiro: "If I do that, my husband will wake up."
Yusaku: "Ah, I see."
*Squeeze.*
Chihiro: "Hyaa...!"
Yusaku: "Then I'll make you let out a different kind of loud voice."
His arm extends over my back.
The demon firmly grasps my breasts.
I was surprised by the direct sensation.
There's nothing.
Nothing to cover it.
Yusaku: "They're shaped like inverted bells, huh?"
Chihiro: "Uuh... kuu..."
*Squish... squeeze...*
Chihiro: "Ha... Nn... Ah..."
Yusaku: "I told you not to move your ass."
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Ah..."
Yusaku: "... This is your punishment for not listening."
Chihiro: "S, stop..."
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Hi... k..."
The sound of the relentless slap echoed.
It reflected off the ceiling and resonated.
A sharp pain brought forth a sob.
Of course, I couldn't even cover my own mouth.
At this rate, he really will wake up.
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Ha... u... u..."
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Nn... u..."
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Hi... it... hurts..."
My buttocks jiggled.
The pain seeped deep inside.
Gradually, only the sensation on the surface became numb.
Only a stifled heat gathered inside my flesh.
Just like when my breasts were slapped.
Being treated this way, my will to resist weakened greatly.
It's not just because of the pain.
I feel lacking in every way.
As a wife.
As a woman.
I feel like I'm being punished for it.
Even though I know it's a stupid thought, I can't help but fall into this delusion.
It's always been like this.
I can't feel at ease unless I'm properly scolded.
Sometimes, I even felt that way towards Sho.
I want my bad parts to be corrected strictly.
I want my mistakes to be punished more.
Otherwise, I'd become a terrible woman.
So, when I made a mistake.
I secretly gripped my thigh out of his sight.
I swore in my heart not to repeat my mistakes.
That's my punishment for myself.
A warning against my flawed self.
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Ah... u... k..."
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Ah... u...!"
Yusaku: "Does it hurt?"
Chihiro: "Y, yes it hurts."
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Hi... it... haa... haa... u..."
Yusaku: "(Heh...)"
Good.
The lady is still the best as ever.
Her buttocks, dyed in autumn leaves color.
Her voice is definitely sweeter than when I slapped her breasts.
Of course, it's not because she's holding back her sobs.
You've just become a little more honest than before.
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Ah, ha... u... k... u..."
The inflamed petals.
Without even touching them, the slit begins to falter.
A lewd drool seeps from the gap.
It seeps out, forming beads like pearls.
It seemed like it could drip onto the floor at any moment.
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Ah... ha... ah... stop... please..."
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "H, hau... u... my husband will... wake up..."
Yusaku: "Hmph..."
Just what I want
He might be able to help if he wakes up
Yusaku: "Just what I want."
Chihiro: "W, what good will it do to wake him up?"
Yusaku: "You'll be in trouble, won't you?"
Chihiro: "You won't get away with it either."
Yusaku: "So?"
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Hi... g..."
Yusaku: "There's always a risk in having fun, right?"
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "Hig... u..."
Yusaku: "Especially if it's something special, even more so."
Chihiro: "So, as long as you're having fun, it's okay to make others unhappy..."
Yusaku: "...Unhappy?"
*Slap!!*
Chihiro: "It... hurts..."
Yusaku: "So, what is your happiness?"
Chihiro: "..."
Yusaku: "Living happily with your husband?"
Chihiro: "I don't need to answer that."
Yusaku: "So you mean, if I get involved, you'll become unhappy?"
Chihiro: "That's exactly what's happening, isn't it?"
*Squish...*
Chihiro: "No... no... ah..."
Yusaku: "...I think it's different."
Chihiro: "N, no fingers... ah, au... no..."
Yusaku: "Isn't it the opposite?"
*Squish... squelch...*
Chihiro: "Ah, so I said... no fingers... Ah... Ah... Ahh..."
Yusaku: "I can make you happier than your husband."
Chihiro: "Only Sho-chan can make me happy."
Yusaku: "Really now..."
Yusaku: "...if he wakes up, he might be able to help you."
Chihiro: "Don't always say mean things."
Yusaku: "Who might it be that likes those mean things, I wonder?"
*Smack!!*
Chihiro: "Ah... Ugh... Ahh..."
Yusaku: "Doesn't it feel good when it's like this?"
Chihiro: "It's just painful, that's all."
Yusaku: "Oh, really?"
*Smack!!*
Chihiro: "Hii... Ahh..."
Yusaku: "Your husband wouldn't do this sort of thing, would he?"
Chihiro: "My husband is not a pervert like you."
*Smack!!*
Chihiro: "Uh... Ugh... Ahh..."
Yusaku: "Me? A pervert?"
Chihiro: "Making me wear this kind of clothing, binding me so I can't move, and even spanking my ass... How is that not perverted, no matter how you look at it?"
Yusaku: "And what about you, ma'am... huh?"
*Squelch*
Chihiro: "Ah... no, the fingers... enough..."
Yusaku: "How do you explain your own soaking state?"
*Squelch... squish... plop*
Chihiro: "Haah... Ah... Ah... Too deep... don't... Ahh..."
Yusaku: "Try saying something, you pervert."
Chihiro: "I... I'm not a pervert."
Yusaku: "Even if your husband, who only sees the surface, doesn't realize..."
*Smack!!*
Chihiro: "Ah... Hii..."
Yusaku: "I've seen right through you a long time ago."
Chihiro: "I don't care how you see me. As long as my husband doesn't think so, I'm fine."
Yusaku: "Really now..."
So she still loves her husband
Even though I understand her better?
Yusaku: "So you still love your husband."
Chihiro: "Don't put it in such a strange way. My feelings haven't changed, not now, not before. They'll stay the same forever."
Yusaku: "The thing with women is, no matter what they say..."
*Squelch*
Chihiro: "No more... Ahh..."
Yusaku: "They instinctively choose the man who can make them happier."
Yusaku: "Even though I understand you better?"
Chihiro: "The one who understands me the most is obviously Sho-chan."
Yusaku: "That's not true."
*Squelch*
Chihiro: "No more... Ahh..."
Yusaku: "I understand you... maybe even more than you do."
*Squelch... squelch*
Chihiro: "Ahh...ugh...ah...no...stop...ahh...mmh...ah..."
Yusaku: "...you understand what I'm saying, right?"
*Squelch... throb... squelch*
Chihiro: "Aggh...ah...ah...ah...no...stop...ah...that place...stop...ahh...ahh...uh...ugh..."
Chihiro: "Please, gag me... so that I can't make a sound... I don't want my husband to see me like this..."
